# About me

I’m {{ site.author }}, a data scientist with a strong focus on analytics, machine learning,
and ethical AI. I enjoy turning complex data into clear insights and practical tools.

- **Interests:** Data science, AI for social good, financial analytics, AI ethics  
- **Skills:** Python, SQL, machine learning, data visualization, analytics strategy  
- **Current focus:** Building data-driven solutions, sharing what I learn through writing and community work.

You can learn more about my professional background in my
[CV]({{ '/assets/cv/Paul_CV.pdf' | relative_url }}) or see what I’m exploring on the
[blog]({{ '/blog/' | relative_url }}).
